remarks: Nonnegative integer exponentiation with a nonnegative mantissa is nonnegative.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
statement:
reexpcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
reexpcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
expge0d.3 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) $.
expge0d $p |- ( ph -> 0 <_ ( A ^ N ) ) $.
